path.style: stroke: none; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;

line.style: stroke: red; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
stroke: red; stroke-width: 2; stroke-dasharray: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dashoffset: 0; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-miterlimit: 4; fill: none; fill-rule: nonzero; opacity: 1;
